title: and Emile Hirsch
description:
Actor Emile Hirsch shares all kinds of stories about how he got started in acting (thanks to his great-uncle), his influences, what it was like on the sets of “Into The Wild, “The Girl Next Door,” and “Lone Survivor,” and the crazy tale of how he landed the role in Quentin Tarantino’s “Once Upon A Time In Hollywood.” He also talks social-distane skateboarding, fanboy’ing out over Sean Penn, working with Randall on “Midnight In The Switchgrass,” and his new music! Plus, Lala dishes on the #PumpRules finale, and the real story behind Scheana Shay’s “One More Time” music video.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
